    • applyDefaultSettings

      ItemStackBuilder applyDefaultSettings()
      Applies default setting to the item, such as: - Makes item unbreakable. - Hides enchantments.

    • applyDefaultSettings

      ItemStackBuilder applyDefaultSettings(boolean applyCurse)
      Applies default setting to the item, such as: - Makes item unbreakable. - Hides enchantments. - Applies curse of binding if applyCurse is true.
      Parameters:
      applyCurse - - If true, applies curse of binding.

    • setPotionMeta

      ItemStackBuilder setPotionMeta(org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffectType type, int lvl, int duration, org.bukkit.Color color)
      Sets potion meta of the item.
      Parameters:
      type - - Potion type.
      lvl - - Potion level.
      duration - - Potion duration.
      color - - Potion color.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if item is not a potion.

      Sets potion color.
      Parameters:
      color - - Color to set.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if item is not a potion.

      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if item is not leather armor.

      name - - Name of the player.

    • setHeadTextureUrl

      ItemStackBuilder setHeadTextureUrl(String url)
      Sets a link to minecraft skin texture as textures. Use Other->Minecraft-URL from minecraft-heads.

    • setHeadTexture

      ItemStackBuilder setHeadTexture(String base64)
      Sets an actual base64 value as textures. Use Other->Value from minecraft-heads.

    • toItemStack

      org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack toItemStack()

      ItemStack.

    • cleanToItemSack

      org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack cleanToItemSack()
      Clears Item flags, name, lore and makes it unbreakable before returning ItemStack. Used to make empty icons items.
      Returns:
      cleaned ItemStack.

    • asIcon

      org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack asIcon()
      Builds item stack and hides all extra data in the lore of the item.
      Returns:
      icon-themed ItemStack.

    • build

      org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack build(boolean overrideIfExists)
      Finalizes item meta and returns an ItemStack.
      Parameters:
      overrideIfExists - - if true, item has ID and item with that ID is already registered it will override the stored item, else error will be throws if 2 conditions were met.
      Returns:
      finalized ItemStack.
      Throws:
      me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.inventory.ItemBuilder.ItemBuilderException - if item has ID which is already registered and overrideIfExists is false.

    • build

      org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack build()
      Finalizes item meta and returns an ItemStack.
      Returns:
      finalized ItemStack.
      Throws:
      me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.inventory.ItemBuilder.ItemBuilderException - if item has ID which is already registered.
